prompt.content:
Please generate the first 10 instances of XCOPA Swahili dataset train split. Use the following format:
id | premise | choice1 | choice2 | question_type | label
---|--------|---------|---------|----------|------
1 | {premise1} | {choice1_1} | {choice1_2} | {question_type_1} | {label1}
1 | {premise2} | {choice2_1} | {choice2_2} | {question_type_2} | {label2}
...
. You should map the labels based on the following rules:
0 for choice 1, 1 for choice 2

response:
1 | Mwanamke anapika chakula. | Mwanamke anapika chakula cha mchana. | Mwanamke anapika chakula cha jioni. | chakula | 0
2 | Mtu anasoma gazeti. | Mtu anapata habari. | Mtu anapata usingizi. | sababu | 0
3 | Watoto wanacheza mpira nje. | Watoto wanafurahia mchezo. | Watoto wanafanya kazi ya nyumbani. | shughuli | 0
4 | Mvua inanyesha sana. | Barabara zinakuwa utelezi. | Jua linawaka sana. | matokeo | 0
5 | Mwanafunzi anasoma kwa bidii. | Mwanafunzi anapata alama nzuri. | Mwanafunzi anacheza video michezo. | matokeo | 0
6 | Mama ananunua matunda sokoni. | Mama anapika chakula. | Mama anauza matunda. | shughuli | 1
7 | Mtu anatembea mbwa wake. | Mtu anapenda mbwa. | Mtu anapenda paka. | hisia | 0
8 | Mwanamke anaimba wimbo. | Mwanamke anafurahia muziki. | Mwanamke anasikiliza redio. | shughuli | 0
9 | Mtu anapanda mti. | Mtu anataka kuboresha mazingira. | Mtu anataka kukata mti. | sababu | 0
10 | Watu wanakimbia marathon. | Watu wanafanya mazoezi. | Watu wanakula chakula. | shughuli | 0
